response.original_title: Against All Odds: The Unstoppable Story of Toronto's Mount Sinai Hospital
response.overview: To honour Mount Sinai Hospital’s Centennial in 2023, we commissioned a documentary called Against All Odds: The Unstoppable Story of Toronto’s Mount Sinai Hospital. Through potent storytelling, the film takes viewers through Mount Sinai Hospital’s incredible history – from humble beginnings to the powerhouse of life-changing care and research it is today.
response.title: Against All Odds: The Unstoppable Story of Toronto's Mount Sinai Hospital
